CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 9, 1954, page 3, reads: "Third Term - Mayor David L. Lawrence this week began an unprecedented third term as the city's chief executive. Here he takes oath of office from Common Pleas Court Judge A. Marshall Thompson. - Harris Photo."David Leo Lawrence was mayor of Pittsburgh from 1946 to 1958, and governor of Pennsylvania from 1959 to 1963. He died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Common Pleas Court Judge A. Marshall Thompson swearing in Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence with priest standing nearby in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers at the City Council Building, Downtown, another version
